TopicTitle: No target icon in external vehicle view

Articles.Content:
Hi

Been doing alot of missions lately where you need to rescue kerbals stuck in orbit, and have completed quite a few by now. There is one thing bugging me however, and that is that I have no target indicator in external vehicle view. I've watched some videos on this subject and they all have their target marked by a green diamond with a distance indicator in EV-view. This is of course of great help and I have no idea why I don't have it, and I would really this feature for when I start to do docking missions. I guess I also should mention that I have set the object as target as well.

I play career mode and have the tracking station fully upgraded, most other buildings are atleast level 2. I run the mods Kerbalengineer, Europeflags and Planetshine. Does anyone have any idea of why I'm missing the target indicator?

Any help much appreciated. 

-V

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-23T13:57:38Z" title="05/23/2015 01:57  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 23, 2015</time> by Valday**
I think it may be from a mod, given what you are describing.
Have you tried **[F4]** yet? [F4] toggles the target indicator on/off. It's either that or you're not within 100km.
Thanks alot Tex, that did it!
